member.name: TS_RUNINFO
member.summary: The TS_RUNINFO structure specifies the properties of text run data.

member.name: TS_RUNINFO.uCount
member.summary: Specifies the number of characters in the text run.

member.name: TS_RUNINFO.type
member.summary: Specifies the text run type. If this parameter is TS_RT_PLAIN, the text run is visible. If this parameter is TS_RT_HIDDEN, the text run is hidden. If this parameter is TS_RT_OPAQUE, the text run is a private data type embedded in the text by application or text service that implements the ITextStore interface.
